channel.title: Compilers on Vineel Kovvuri
channel.description: Recent content in Compilers on Vineel Kovvuri

item.title: Compiler Internals
item.description: Basics //a.c int myadd() { int sum = 10; for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) sum += i; return sum; } int myadd2() { int sum = 10; for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) sum += i*i; return sum; } int main() { return myadd(); } >cl /c a.c >link /dump /symbols a.obj 008 00000000 SECT3 notype () External | myadd 009 00000050 SECT3 notype () External | myadd2 00A 000000A0 SECT3 notype () External | main The link /dump command dumps the symbols that are part of the obj file.
